thread.section_title: Reuters: Financial Services and Real Estate
thread.title: Sturm Ruger says majority of investors back call for safety report

title: Sturm Ruger says majority of investors back call for safety report
text:
May 9, 2018 / 4:32 PM / in 17 minutes Sturm Ruger says majority of investors back call for safety report Reuters Staff 1 Min Read
BOSTON, May 9 (Reuters) - Sturm Ruger & Co executives said on Wednesday a majority of the gunmaker’s investors backed a shareholder resolution calling for a safety report.
Sturm Ruger leaders also said at the company’s annual meeting, which was webcast, that all nine of its director nominees received a majority of support from shareholders. (Reporting by Ross Kerber Editing by Chizu Nomiyama)
